mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(post_uuid) AS postCount FROM post_board WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS row_num FROM ( SELECT post_uuid, write_id, post_title, post_content, registry_date FROM post_board WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY registry_date DESC ) TMP, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) SUB ORDER BY TMP.registry_date ASC ) T ORDER BY T.row_num DESC LIMIT ${offset}, ${limitRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_board(board_uuid, write_id, board_title, board_content) VALUE(#{postUuid}, #{writeId}, #{postTitle}, #{postContent})
